summary: MY TRANSMISSION DIED ON 21 NOV 2003, @ 42,500 MILES.  THE DEALER REPLACED IT.  AGAIN, I SUFFERED A FAILURE, ON 23 JAN 2004...I THOUGHT IT WAS THE TRANSMISSION AGAIN,  BUT DEALER STATED IT WAS THE IDLE AIR CONTROL VALVE...WHICH - HE SAID...CAN MIMIC   TRANSMISSION FAILURE DUE TIO IMPROPER ENGINE COMMANDS.  I'M NOT SURE I BELIEVE THIS.  THIS IS AN ACURA 3.2 TL/TYPE S MODEL.  *AK
